statements: DELETE FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 50000 AND trade_agreement = false;
DELETE FROM player_contracts WHERE trade_agreement = TRUE AND contract_amount > 50000
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id = 100 AND team_id = 1;
DELETE FROM trade_agreements WHERE trade_date < '2022-01-01' AND (receiving_team_id = 2 OR sending_team_id = 3);
DELETE FROM TradeAgreements WHERE player_id = 101 AND team_id = 5;
DELETE FROM trade_agreements WHERE trade_id = 101 AND trade_date < '2022-05-01';
